body.p: The Search view allows you to search for specific content in all of the XML, Markdown, and text files from your personal workspace associated to a project.

Enter the text you want to search for in the search field at the top of the page. You can click on a result to open that file in the visual editor. You can click on the In reviews tab to filter your search query by the author, time, or type of content.
The Clear Index button that appears at the bottom-right part of the Search side view resets the entire project indexing data. You can start a new search to re-index the project content.
